detaileddescription.para: cache_content_flush: Flushes the content of a file in the local cache to the FSAL data.
Flushes the content of a file in the local cache to the FSAL data. This routine should be called only from the cache_inode layer.
No lock management is done in this layer: the related pentry in the cache inode layer is locked and will prevent from concurent accesses.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in file content layer whose content is to be flushed.
[IN] should we delete the cached entry in local or not ?
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management. [OUT] returned status.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_refresh: Refreshes the whole content of a file in the local cache to the FSAL data.
Refreshes the whole content of a file in the local cache to the FSAL data. This routine should be called only from the cache_inode layer.
No lock management is done in this layer: the related pentry in the cache inode layer is locked and will prevent from concurent accesses.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in file content layer whose content is to be flushed.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management. [OUT] returned status.

xrefdescription.para: : BUGAZOMEU: gestion de coherence de date a mettre en place
